nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:enchanted_book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Enchanted Book\",\"color\":\"white\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Smelting Touch I\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"Automatically smelts broken\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"blocks into their smelted form.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Use this on an item in an Anvil\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to apply it!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Source:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"I: \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"Enchantment Table,\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"Coal Collection\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Applied To:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Axe\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Drill\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Pickaxe\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Shovel\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Gauntlet\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Conflicts:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Silk Touch\",\"color\":\"red\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"COMMON\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
